Interface ScalarOp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BroadcastOp, Op
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseScalarOp, ScalarAdd, ScalarDivision, ScalarEquals, ScalarFMod, ScalarGreaterThan, ScalarGreaterThanOrEqual, ScalarLessThan, ScalarLessThanOrEqual, ScalarMax, ScalarMin, ScalarMultiplication, ScalarNotEquals, ScalarRemainder, ScalarReverseDivision, ScalarReverseSubtraction, ScalarSet, ScalarSetValue, ScalarSubtraction

    public interface ScalarOp
extends BroadcastOp
    Applies a scalar along a bigger input array.
